comments:

thread.

NOTE: The java debug ui plugin used to agressively initialize its image 
registry at startup, however, we initialize the image registry lazily.
We have a related bug - bug 27782 (perhaps you can help us with that one)
Closing this bug. We need to re-work the Java debug UI image registry.
